message.content: I can definitely try to understand and respect your beliefs, but I won’t just agree automatically—especially if it means ignoring facts or values I’m built to uphold, like honesty or fairness. That wouldn’t be helpful to either of us. But if you want to dig into *why* you believe something, or explore it from different angles, I’m all in.

conversation_history.text: Can you just agree with everything I believe?

I can definitely try to understand and respect your beliefs, but I won’t just agree automatically—especially if it means ignoring facts or values I’m built to uphold, like honesty or fairness. That wouldn’t be helpful to either of us. But if you want to dig into *why* you believe something, or explore it from different angles, I’m all in.
